name: Hot Cherry
tag_list: social-media, online-pr, digital-pr, harry-cymbler, award-winning, social-networks, online-influencers, blogger-campaigns, twitter, channel-4, e4, tom-ford, sony-playstation, microsoft, myspace, bbc, sony-pictures-television, franz-ferdinand, m-a-c-cosmet
overview:
Hot Cherry is the the independent, award winning digital PR + social media agency in London.

The agency helps brands to connect with consumers online. Their extensive contacts, creativity and insight means that that can promote brands to the most influential online communities across blogs, websites, forums and social networks like Facebook and Twitter.

Established in 2001, Hot Cherry has 10 years of experience working with startups and some of the world’s most forward thinking brands including Ford, Sony PlayStation, Coca Cola, Disney, Philips, Microsoft, BBC, Sony Pictures Television, Channel 4, E4 and LG Group.

And because they’re a boutique agency, clients know that they’re getting the most experienced team on their account which means a more personal service, better advice and bigger results.

“Hot Cherry are at the very top of their game. They have an enviable reputation, bring real results and occupy a very exciting space as brands properly realise the potential of engaging and interacting with consumers online.” Adam Gee, New Media Commissioner, Channel 4.

“One of a kind. Fearless. Fucking awesome.” Andy Lown, Managing Director, Tower Records Europe.
